attributes.action: Make June 23rd a national holiday - "UK Independence Day"
attributes.additional_details: We like being part of the common market and we are sure that we will be able to negotiate good trading terms with the EU as an independent state.  We look forward to a bright future and closer trade ties with our commonwealth partners and other nations around the world whom we have not been able to develop due to our EU membership.
attributes.background:
We would like the government to make June 23rd a national holiday and call it "UK Independence Day"

We would like to thank David Cameron & Government for giving the British people the choice over the EU.  We feel that the EU is a great institution but that we no longer want to be a part of it.
